mapper.select: SELECT id as id, title as title, publisher as publisher, release_department as releaseDepartment, release_date as releaseDate, summary as summary, rich_text as richText, create_time as createTime FROM oa_corporate_honor ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 5
